note.p: Honours: Viscount Kilwarlin and Earl of Hillsborough (Ireland) 1751
Baron Harwich 1756; Viscount Fairford and Earl of Hillsborough (Great Britain) 1772; Marquess of Downshire 1789
References: Bernard Bailyn, '1776: The British Dimension' in NR 1976-7 vol 31 pp 179-199

Notes: Elected a Fellow as Earl of Hillsborough (in the peerage of Ireland), at which time he also held the title of Baron Harwich in the peerage of Great Britain. It was not until later that he became Earl of Hillsborough in the peerage of Great Britain, and then Marquess of Downshire.
